bundle.name: rkhunter

description.p: Install rkhunter, a tool used to verify that a certain number of files do not get infected by a rootkit.

field.name: contact_email
field.label: Contact Email Address
field.description: The email address of the person to contact when rkhunter finds problems on a computer. If you want to email a list, use one email address and set it as a broadcast in your mail system (instead of trying to as rkhunter to email a long list of people.) So enter exactly one email address here.

bundle.postinst:
cat >/etc/rkhunter.d/50-snap.conf <<EOF # My specific settings for my halk system
# Email a message to this address #MAIL-ON-WARNING=$BUNDLE_INSTALLATION_CONTACT_EMAIL # /etc/default/rkhunter (may need to be in ...) REPORT_EMAIL=$BUNDLE_INSTALLATION_CONTACT_EMAIL
# Change the syslog level to notice instead of the default of warning USE_SYSLOG=authpriv.notice
# No need for any colors AUTO_X_DETECT=0
# TBD: old script white list entries #SCRIPTWHITELIST=/usr/bin/groups #SCRIPTWHITELIST=/usr/bin/lwp-request
# Allow some hidden directories ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/etc/.java #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.udev #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.udevdb #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.udev.tdb #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.static #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.initramfs #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.SRC-unix #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.mdadm #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.blkid.tab #ALLOWHIDDENDIR=/dev/.blkid.tab.old
# Allow various device files #ALLOWDEVFILE=/dev/abc #ALLOWDEVFILE=/dev/shm/PostgreSQL.* #ALLOWDEVFILE=/dev/shm/pulse-shm-* #ALLOWDEVFILE=/dev/shm/sem.ADBE_ReadPrefs_* #ALLOWDEVFILE=/dev/shm/sem.ADBE_REL_* #ALLOWDEVFILE=/dev/shm/sem.ADBE_WritePrefs_*
# Allow Cassandra which uses port 7000 often detected as a rogue IRC port #PORT_PATH_WHITELIST=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java:TCP:7000 EOF
